attributes.action: Support our Armed Forces Veterans  better than you support other countries.
attributes.additional_details: I am a veteran.  I am lucky as I came through my time unscathed.  I know and I have seen the lack of help and support that our Veterans get.  We are a caring and supportive country to other people but we are not very good at supporting our own.
attributes.background: As a country, we have a good record in helping people in other countries who need are help but we DON'T give enough support to our Serving personell or our Veterans.
